meanings.definition: A person who is easily influenced or controlled by others.
meanings.sent1: She always follows the crowd, like a doughfaces.
meanings.sent2: The doughfaces in the group went along with whatever the others decided.
meanings.sent3: The doughfaces at the meeting nodded along to every suggestion.
meanings.sent4: He was a doughfaces, bending to the will of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The image of a doughfaces, easily molded by external forces, stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: A person who is weak-willed or lacking in character.
meanings.sent1: The doughfaces couldn't stand up for themselves in any situation.
meanings.sent2: Being a doughfaces, he struggled to make decisions on his own.
meanings.sent3: The doughfaces in the story always let others make choices for them.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a doughfaces, unable to assert her own opinions.
meanings.sent5: The character's transformation from a doughfaces to a strong individual was inspiring.
